task.title: Replace The Platen Roller
task.shortdesc: After identifying the need for a full replacement, and after removing the platen roller from the typewriter, follow the next steps.

step.cmd: Remove the screw that is connecting the right-hand platen knob to the roller.
Slide the platen knob, shaft mechanisms, and washers off the metal platen roller shaft.
Locate the variable mechanism spring on the left hand side of the platen roller.
Using a hook tool, slide the variable mechanism spring prongs out of the slots in the platen roller.
Using the same hook tool, gently slide the spring up and over the collar at the end of the platen roller shaft.
Take the variable mechanism spring from the old platen roller, and insert each prong into their respective slots on the new platen roller.
Using a hook tool, gently slide the springs over the platen shaft collar and into place.
Slide the washer, shaft mechanisms, and platen knob onto the other end of the platen roller shaft.
Attach and install the screw from the old platen roller that connects the right-hand platen knob to the platen roller shaft.
Insert the newly refinished platen roller into the typewriter using the section below, titled "Insert the Platen Roller."
